fields.name: Squats
fields.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower your hips as if sitting in a chair, then push through your heels to stand up

fields.name: Lunges
fields.description: Step forward with one leg, lower your hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees, then push back to the starting position.

fields.name: Leg Press
fields.description: Sit on a leg press machine, push the platform away by extending your knees and hips, then return to the starting position.

fields.name: Deadlift
fields.description: With feet hip-width apart, bend at hips and knees to lower a barbell, then lift by straightening hips and knees.

fields.name: Calf Raises
fields.description: Stand on a raised surface with heels hanging off, raise your heels as high as possible, then lower them below the level of the platform.

fields.name: Bicep Curls
fields.description: Hold a dumbbell in each hand with arms extended. Curl the weights up to shoulder level by bending your elbows, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Tricep Dips
fields.description: Using a bench or chair, place your hands behind you and lower your body by bending your elbows, then push back up to the starting position

fields.name: Push-Ups
fields.description: With hands placed slightly wider than shoulder-width apart, lower your body to the ground by bending your elbows, then push back up.

fields.name: Hammer Curls
fields.description: Hold a dumbbell in each hand with palms facing your body. Curl the weights up while keeping your palms facing inwards, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Tricep Extensions
fields.description: Hold a dumbbell with both hands overhead. Lower the weight behind your head by bending your elbows, then extend your arms back to the starting position.

fields.name: Shoulder Press
fields.description: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height, palms facing forward. Press the weights overhead until your arms are fully extended, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Lateral Raises
fields.description: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides. Raise your arms out to the sides until they reach shoulder height, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Front Raises
fields.description: Hold a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs. Lift the weights straight in front of you to shoulder height, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Arnold Press
fields.description: Hold dumbbells in front of your shoulders, palms facing your body. Rotate your palms outward while pressing the weights overhead, then reverse the motion to return to the starting position

fields.name: Upright Rows
fields.description: Hold a barbell or dumbbells with an overhand grip. Lift the weights straight up to your collarbone by bending your elbows, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Bench Press
fields.description: Lie on a bench with a barbell or dumbbells. Lower the weights to your chest, then press them back up until your arms are fully extended.

fields.name: Push-Ups
fields.description: Place your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart on the floor. Lower your body by bending your elbows, then push back up to the starting position.

fields.name: Chest Flyes
fields.description: Lie on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, arms extended above your chest. Lower the weights out to the sides in a wide arc, then bring them back up to the starting position.

fields.name: Incline Bench Press
fields.description: Lie on an incline bench with a barbell or dumbbells. Lower the weights to your upper chest, then press them back up until your arms are fully extended.

fields.name: Chest Dips
fields.description: Hold onto parallel bars with your arms straight. Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the floor, then push back up to the starting position.

fields.name: Plank
fields.description: Hold a push-up position with your body in a straight line from head to heels, resting on your forearms. Keep your core tight and hold the position.

fields.name: Russian Twists
fields.description: Sit on the floor with knees bent and feet lifted. Lean back slightly, hold a weight or medicine ball, and twist your torso to the right and left.

fields.name: Bicycle Crunches
fields.description: Lie on your back with hands behind your head. Bring one knee towards your chest while simultaneously twisting your opposite elbow towards it, alternating sides

fields.name: Leg Raises
fields.description: Lie on your back with legs straight. Lift your legs towards the ceiling, keeping them straight, then slowly lower them back down without touching the floor.

fields.name: Mountain Climbers
fields.description: Start in a plank position. Bring one knee towards your chest, then quickly switch legs, mimicking a running motion while keeping your body straight.

fields.name: Pull-Ups
fields.description: Hang from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart. Pull your body up until your chin is above the bar, then lower back down

fields.name: Bent-Over Rows
fields.description: Hold a barbell or dumbbells with an overhand grip. Bend at the hips with a slight bend in the knees, then pull the weight towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together, and lower it back down.

fields.name: Lat Pulldowns
fields.description: Sit at a lat pulldown machine, grip the bar with hands wider than shoulder-width. Pull the bar down to your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together, then slowly release it back up.

fields.name: T-Bar Rows
fields.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, bend at the hips, and grasp the T-bar row handle. Pull the weight towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together, then lower it back down

fields.name: Seated Cable Rows
fields.description: Sit at a cable row machine with feet placed against the footrests. Grasp the cable handle with both hands, keep your back straight, and pull the handle towards your abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Slowly release the handle back to the starting position.
